sections.heading: Writ; return by person detaining; signature and verification
sections.text: The return or statement shall be signed by the person making it, and it shall be sworn to by him, unless he is a public officer and makes the return in his official capacity.SourceG.S.1873, c. 58, ยง 372, p. 808;R.S.1913, ยง 9264;C.S.1922, ยง
